title: Am I allowed to change the language on the NA server
body: I would like to play in French on the NA server, but it is not an option. Is changing the language file a bannable offense?

replies.body: Changing the language in itself is not usually a bannable offense, however, it's not something we support. While I don't recommend it, if you choose to make the change, keep in mind that doing so is at your own risk. If you run into issues, you'll likely need to repair or reinstall your game to undo the change.

Will it ever be an option to change language legally on the NA server? I don't get why it's looked on so negatively, it's not like having your game in a non-English language stops you communicating with teammates in English :s

It's not that it's illegal, it's just unsupported because each client is patched with different languages in mind and how it's structured is my only guess.

at least let people switch between spanish english and french since as far as that goes you cover everything south of us and north of us. Most places directly south speak spanish, also it's the second most spoken language in the world i think? and canda's national language is french (as well as english). 
I know there is a LAN server but some people may still want to play on US servers to play with friends or just because they can.
It may not get you banned but it might flag your account. I recommend playing in English.
